name.am,ar,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es,es_419,: THunt - Temu™免费商品数据分析 & 下载工具

short.am,ar,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es,es_419,: 榜单 & 品类商品的批量分析、商品以图搜货源、评论分析 & 下载、商品图下载、相似商品，助力卖家精准选品。
short.bg,bn,ca,cs,da,et,fa,fil,gu,he,hr,kn,lt,: Free product data analysis tool for Temu. Help seller find out what's hot product.
short.en: Free product data analysis tool. Help seller find out what's hot product.

long.am,ar,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es,es_419,:
👋 👋 Temu™商品数据分析 & 下载工具
通过对Temu™榜单内商品以及品类商品进行批量数据分析，帮助您分析热销商品。
您可以利用这款特姆选品工具进行快速比价、评估卖家信誉，以最大化您的利润空间！
您还可以提前了解销售同款商品的竞争对手，让您的决定更加慎重！


👋 👋 【主要功能】

💰 1.Temu选品 & Temu™产品研究
使用这款插件，您只需按图片搜索即可找到价格更低、销量更高的同类产品。
对于每件产品，这款Temu卖家工具提供：
➡️ 商品概览：包括销量、销售额、上架时间、开店时间等基础信息。
➡️ 商品图批量下载：包含商品主图、规格图、描述图。
➡️ 商品评论分析：包括好评率、差评率、评论内容等信息。
➡️ 竞争对手列表：包括销售相同产品的卖家名称、销量等信息。
➡️ 以图搜货源：根据商品主图，为您寻找速卖通、淘宝、1688等平台的同款商品货源。
➡️ 榜单页面/品类页面：提供统计图表、统计面板及商品列表数据预览&导出功能。
➡️ 商品详情页面：提供商品基础信息、商品表现趋势(总销量、价格、评论量)
——————————————————————————————————

👋 👋 如何使用它？
——————————————————————————————————
只需将其这款特卖选品工具安装到您的 Chrome 浏览器上，访问Temu.com，该扩展程序就会自动为您执行所有操作！
1.您会在首页、分类页面和搜索结果页面找到最畅销的图表。
2. 在您搜索的每个结果下，会出现附加的扩展信息面板。
3. 点击商品主图上悬浮的图标，您可以快速查看同款商品的其它货源渠道。
——————————————————————————————————

👋 👋 👋 👋 👋 👋 👋 👋 👋 👋
“Temu™商品数据分析扩展”是您直销业务的必备工具！
 立即免费下载扩展，让您的直销业务更上一层楼！
long.bg,bn,ca,cs,da,et,fa,fil,gu,he,hr,kn,lt,:
👋 👋 Thunt - Temu™ Product Analysis Tool. It helps you quickly analyze hot-selling products and make smarter decisions.
You can use this plug-in to quickly compare prices and evaluate seller reputation quickly to maximize your profit margin!
You can also get a better understanding of the competitive landscape and make more competitive decisions.

👋 👋 What are the main functions?

💰 1.Temu Product research
With this plugin, you can simply search by image to find similar products with lower prices and higher sales.
For each product, this plugin provides:
➡️ Product overview: Includes basic information such as sales, sales volume, and listing time.
➡️ Bulk download of product images: Includes main images, specifications, and descriptions.
➡️ Product review analysis: Includes information such as rating, bad rating, and review content.
➡️ List of competitors: Includes information such as seller name, sales volume, and other competitors.
➡️ Image search for sources: Finds sources for products on platforms such as AliExpress, Taobao, and 1688 based on product images.
➡️ Ranking pages/category pages: Provides statistical charts, statistical panels, and product list data preview and export functions.

————————————————————————————————

👋 👋 How to use it?
————————————————————————————————
Just install it on your Chrome browser, visit Temu.com and the extension will do it all for you automatically!

1. Install the Data analysis extension on your Chrome browser.
2. Visit website.
3. You will find the most popular charts on the home page, category page, and search results page.
4. An additional extension information panel will appear under each result you search.
5. Click on the floating icon on the product image to quickly view other source channels for the same product.
————————————————————————————————

👋 👋 👋 👋 👋 👋 👋 👋 👋 👋
Thunt - Temu™ Product Analysis Tool is a must-have tool for your wholesale business! 
Download for free now and take your wholesale business to the next level!
